titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Bridge golden anniversary dinner seating list 1992.002
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:13:52 +0000.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn Bridge golden anniversary dinner seating list

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Hotel St. George (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: A printed, alphabetical list of attendees and their seat placements at a banquet at the the Grand Ball Room, Hotel St. George, Brooklyn, NY. The event commemorated the 50th anniversary of the Brooklyn Bridge, which opened in 1883.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Bridge golden anniversary dinner seating list, 1992.002, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1992.
